item.title: Auto seller/spammer
item.dc:creator: @wall_of_fir wall of fir
item.description:
@wall_of_fir wrote:

[scar]//////////////////////////////////////////////////
// RS super Spammer //
// By wall of fir //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////
// -Safer then shortkeys or any other programs//
// since it types humanlike and uses the RS //
// text effects //
// -Just fill in what you want it to say, then//
// watch it spam that with a random text //
// effect every time, it has all possible //
// text combinations. Also put in which //
// phrase to spam, and how may times. //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Verison Log //
// -0.1::Release //
// -0.2::Added multi sayings. //
// - 0.3 Released to public
//////////////////////////////////////////////////
program RSspammer;
{.include RSCI.txt}
var
Dones : Integer;
Affect, Color, Phrases : array[0…12] of string;
const
UsePhrase = 1 ; //Which phrase you want to spam(1-10).
Times = 15; //Number of times to spam.

procedure LoadIt;
begin
Phrases[1] := \’\’;
Phrases[2] := \’\’;
Phrases[3] := \’\’;
Phrases[4] := \’\’;
Phrases[5] := \’\’;
Phrases[6] := \’\’;
Phrases[7] := \’\’;
Phrases[8] := \’\’;
Phrases[9] := \’\’;
Phrases[10] := \’\’;
//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\ DONT EDIT BELOW THIS POINT //\\\\//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\//\\\\
Affect[0]:=\’\’;
Affect[1]:=\‘shake:\’;
Affect[2]:=\‘wave:\’;
Affect[3]:=\‘scroll:\’;
Affect[4]:=\‘slide:\’;
Affect[5]:=\‘wave2:\’;
color[0]:=\’\’;
color[1]:=\‘red:\’;
color[3]:=\‘green:\’;
color[4]:=\‘cyan:\’;
color[5]:=\‘purple:\’;
color[6]:=\‘white:\’;
color[7]:=\‘flash1:\’;
color[8]:=\‘flash2:\’;
color[9]:=\‘flash3:\’;
color[10]:=\‘glow1:\’;
color[11]:=\‘glow2:\’;
color[12]:=\‘glow3:\’;
end;

procedure Spam;
var
RandAffect, RandCol : Integer;
begin
RandAffect:=Random(5);
RandCol:=Random(12);
OldTypeSend(color[RandCol] + Affect[RandAffect] + Phrases[UsePhrase]);
Dones:=Dones + 1;
end;

begin
WriteLn(\‘Thanks for using my RS spammer! to sure love me!\’);
Status(\‘f00k Jagex, w00t mopar\’);
LoadIt;
repeat
Spam;
Wait(10 + Random(10))
until(Times = Dones)
writeln(\‘Finished Spamming\’)
terminatescript;
end. [/scar]
This one I like best, I use it to sell stuff in world 1 sometimes hope y’all like!

Read full topic
